# vDSP_normalizeD

**Function**

Computes double-precision mean and standard deviation, and then calculates new elements to have a zero mean and a unit standard deviation.

## Declaration

```swift
extern void vDSP_normalizeD(const double * __A, vDSP_Stride __IA, double * __C, vDSP_Stride __IC, double * __Mean, double * __StandardDeviation, vDSP_Length __N);
```

## Discussion

This is the same as [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vDSP_normalize], except for the types of `A`, `C`, `Mean`, and `StandardDeviation`.

## Normalization Functions

- **vDSP_normalize**: Computes single-precision mean and standard deviation, and then calculates new elements to have a zero mean and a unit standard deviation.
